thread.title: Beer backdrop draws attention while Yankees discuss CC Sabathia's alcohol rehab
thread.title_full: Beer backdrop draws attention while Yankees discuss CC Sabathia's alcohol rehab

title: Beer backdrop draws attention while Yankees discuss CC Sabathia's alcohol rehab
text:
Beer backdrop draws attention while Yankees discuss CC Sabathia's alcohol rehab THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   8:43   8:43   
People: 
New York (1742) 
NEW YORK — CC Sabathia's alcohol problem drew attention at Yankee Stadium. So did the backdrop at Monday's news conference — a banner with several beer logos. 
Yankees manager Joe Girardi and general manager Brian Cashman talked about the pitcher's decision to enter a rehab center. They spoke in the stadium interview room in front of a Major League Baseball banner for the AL wild-card game that advertised "presented by Budweiser." 
Budweiser is the presenting sponsor for Tuesday night's game between the Houston Astros and New York.
